subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: St. Louis, which had the fewest home runs in the National League during the regular season, hit four in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S. to beat the Giants, 5-4, and tie the series.
snippet: St. Louis, which had the fewest home runs in the National League during the regular season, hit four in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S. to beat the Giants, 5-4, and tie the series.
